msg: HTTPCLIENT-1504: do not allow zero total max and max per route settings (also consistent with the behaviour of AbstractNIOConnPool)

msg: Optimize w/ duplicated listeners and use of SO_REUSEPORT

author: desruisseaux
msg: Rollback the restriction of FeatureType name to TypeName. While FeatureAssociationRole.valueType in ISO 19109
was suggesting that FeatureType names were instances of TypeName, the evidence is not strong enough. So we keep
GenericName for now as a conservative approach.
